group.label: Express process (NUS)
group.show: $SHOW=0 exists('sampling','parameter','processed'):$es if ($es>0.5) then getvalue('sampling','processed'):$s if ($s='sparse') then $SHOW=1 endif endif

group.label: Process 2D
group.show: $SHOW=0 exists('ni','parameter'):$e exists('ni','parameter','processed'):$e2 if ( ($e>0.5) and ($e2>0.5) ) then $SHOW=1 endif

button.label: CA x HN 2D
button.show: $SHOW=0 $ni2=1 exists('ni2','parameter','processed'):$e2 if ($e2>0.5) then getvalue('ni2','processed'):$ni2 endif getvalue('ni','processed'):$ni if ( ($ni>1) and ($ni2<2) ) then $SHOW=1 endif

group.show: $SHOW=0 exists('ni2','parameter'):$e exists('ni2','parameter','processed'):$e2 if (($e>0.5) and ($e2>0.5)) then if ni2>0 then $SHOW=1 else $SHOW=0 endif endif

button.label: N x HN 2D
button.show: $SHOW=0 getvalue('ni2','processed'):$ni2 getvalue('ni','processed'):$ni if ( ($ni2>1) and ($ni<2) ) then $SHOW=1 endif

button.label: CA x N x HN 3D
button.show: $SHOW=0 getvalue('ni','processed'):$ni getvalue('ni2','processed'):$ni2 if ( ($ni2>1) and ($ni>1) ) then $SHOW=1 endif
